name: Advanced Topics and Methods in Neural Circuit Analysis
description: This course will survey different fields in neural circuit research ranging from sensory systems to motor control. Emphasis will be placed on new methodologies used to deconstruct circuit function, including advanced functional imaging, optogenetics, anatomical reconstruction and the latest behavioural approaches.
prerequisites: BIOC32H3 or NROC34H3 or NROC64H3 or NROC69H3
